about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Invest Gold Gjokaj is your premier destination for engagement rings, wedding rings, gold bracelets, and gold chains in Kosovo. We create unforgettable moments with our curated collection of gold jewelry, including modern engagement rings, classic wedding bands, custom gold bracelets, and quality gold chains. Each piece is crafted with expertise to immortalize your special moments.

rings.title: Ring
rings.subtitle: Choose the perfect engagement or wedding ring from our curated collection. Discover unique gold bracelets and chains designed for every special moment in your life. Our gold craftsmanship ensures lasting quality and timeless style.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Discover our curated collection of gold jewelry and professional services
services.seoDescription: Professional gold jewelry services in Kosovo, including engagement rings, wedding rings, gold bracelets, and custom gold chains

rings.title: Engagement & Wedding Rings
rings.description: Exclusive collection of engagement and wedding rings, masterfully crafted from the purest gold. Modern and classic designs for your most important moments.

bracelets.title: Gold Bracelets & Bangles
bracelets.description: Custom gold bracelets and bangles, created with intricate details for every style and occasion. Choose from our extensive collection of unique designs.

necklaces.title: Gold Chains & Necklaces
necklaces.description: Gold chains and necklaces in various designs, from classic to modern. All crafted with pure gold to ensure premium quality.

custom.title: Custom Jewelry
custom.description: We create custom jewelry according to your preferences. From design to realization, every detail is tailored to your specifications.

repair.title: Professional Repair
repair.description: Professional repair services for all types of gold jewelry. Restoration and maintenance with maximum care.

express.title: Express Service
express.description: Quick fulfillment of your orders, maintaining our signature high quality standards.

delivery.title: Home Delivery
delivery.description: Secure transportation service for your products right to your doorstep.

guarantee.title: Full Guarantee
guarantee.description: We offer a complete guarantee for all our products, ensuring the highest quality standards.

jewelry.description: We offer our customers the opportunity to discover a unique, elegant, and precious world of jewelry.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Invest Gold Gjokaj. By accessing and using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing our website and making purchases, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

products.title: Products
products.content: We offer high-quality gold and precious metal products. While we strive to display accurate product information, we reserve the right to modify specifications without prior notice.

pricing.title: Pricing and Payment
pricing.content: All prices are subject to change without notice. Prices for precious metals are based on current market rates. Payment must be made in full before order processing begins.

orders.title: Order Processing
orders.content: Orders are subject to availability and confirmation. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order for any reason, including pricing errors.

shipping.title: Shipping and Delivery
shipping.content: We ship to selected locations. Delivery times may vary based on location and product availability. All shipments are fully insured.

returns.title: Returns and Refunds
returns.content: Due to the nature of precious metals, returns are only accepted for defective products. Please inspect your items upon delivery.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content on this website is our property and is protected by copyright and intellectual property laws.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: We shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use of our products or services.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our website constitutes acceptance of any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us through our provided contact information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Invest Gold Gjokaj, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services:

items.personal: Personal information (name, email, address, phone number)
items.payment: Payment information (processed securely through our payment providers)
items.technical: Technical information (IP address, browser type, device information)
items.usage: Usage data (how you interact with our website)

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information for the following purposes:

items.process: To process and fulfill your orders
items.improve: To improve our website and services
items.communicate: To communicate with you about your orders and our services

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We only share your information with trusted partners necessary to provide our services and as required by law.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your browsing experience and analyze website traffic.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have certain rights regarding your personal information:

items.access: Right to access your personal information
items.deletion: Right to request deletion of your information
items.restriction: Right to restrict processing of your information

updates.title: Updates to Privacy Policy
updates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy or how we handle your information, please contact us.

footer.description: Invest Gold Gjokaj is your trusted partner for precious metal investments and custom jewelry designs.
